feed.title: Ghost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.92.0
entry.content:
• ✨ Added Tips & Donations one-off payments - Kevin Ansfield
  • 🎨 Convert portal links to relative to avoid homepage flash on click (#20896) - Kevin Ansfield
  • 🐛 Fixed unsaved changes modal showing when title has leading/trailing whitespace - Kevin Ansfield

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.91.0...v5.92.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.93.0
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed Tips & Donations checkout error for sites with long titles - Kevin Ansfield

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.92.0...v5.93.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.94.0
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed "Unsaved changes" modal showing for some published posts with images - Kevin Ansfield
  • 🐛 Fixed bookmark card hot linking icons and thumbnails (#20923) - Princi Vershwal

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.93.0...v5.94.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.94.1
entry.content:
This release contains fixes for minor bugs and issues reported by Ghost users.

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.94.0...v5.94.1

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.94.2
entry.content:
• 🎨 Wrapped missing i18n strings in portal (#21042) - Cathy Sarisky
  • 🎨 Added a maximum limit of 100 for GET members admin endpoint (#20643) - Princi Vershwal
  • 🐛 Fixed wrong breadcrumb and missing post status when starting new post from analytics - Kevin Ansfield
  • 🐛 Fixed fetching and storing bookmark card icons and thumbnails (#21036) - Princi Vershwal
  • 🐛 Fixed member filtering for "Unsubscribed from newsletter" filters (#20926) - Sag

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.94.1...v5.94.2
